title: What Build Back Better Actually Means | Guest: Rep. Dan Crenshaw | 9/22/21
description:
President Biden focused on climate change in a recent speech, and Glenn exposes the hidden agenda behind the speech. Rep. Dan Crenshaw joins to talk about the ongoing crisis at the border. Are we headed toward a global government? Glenn and Stu discuss the mistakes our government has made recently and how these mistakes may have been intentional from the beginning. The mayor of San Francisco had a poor excuse for being caught maskless, and Glenn and Stu make fun of the hypocrisy. What band puts you in the spirit to remove your mask? Glenn shares a bucket list item of his: meeting Clint Eastwood.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
